TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRowSetWriter implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: An interface which provides functionality for a disconnected RowSet to put data updates back to the data source from which the RowSet was originally populated.

remarks.para: An interface which provides functionality for a disconnected RowSet to put data updates back to the data source from which the RowSet was originally populated. An object implementing this interface is called a writer.
The writer must establish a connection to the RowSet's database before writing the data. The RowSet calling this interface must implement the RowSetInternal interface.

The writer may encounter a situation where the updated data needs to be written back to the database, but has already been updated there in the mean time. How a conflict of this kind is handled is determined by the implementation of this writer.
See Also

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool WriteData(class Javax.Sql.IRowSetInternal theRowSet) cil managed

Docs.param:
a row set that fulfills the following criteria:
it must implement the RowSetInternal interface,
have this RowSetWriter registered with it,
must call this method internally.
Docs.summary: Writes changes made in the RowSet, which is associated with this RowSetWriter, back to the database.

remarks.para: Writes changes made in the RowSet, which is associated with this RowSetWriter, back to the database.

Docs.exception: if a problem occurs accessing the database.
